ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoFillInAllValues
ValidationMessage.comment: All fields need to be filled with values.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoWithoutSoldTo
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: You can't create an order without a sold to.
ValidationMessage.comment: Sold to fields need to be filled with values.

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoWithoutPreSalesCP
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: You can't create an Pre-Sales order without a Comercial Policy.
ValidationMessage.comment: The commercial policy need to be filled.
